body: So, is this over or has Aji just not gotten around to making new chapters yet? Kinda hoping that Jun ends up killing or maiming Kazuya in the end since he's already been in that mindset before and now Katsuko probably wouldn't be able to stop him like she did before. Plus, it'd actually be interesting instead of the usual bland NTR ending.
Never read NTR if you have a weak mental, just take it easy and don't take this story seriously... Remember these all just fiction..
Damn thing still hasn't ended I wonder when will the next chapter come

This dude (Jun) went from trying to shank the bastard, kicking sensei out of his life because he can't trust her any more... to letting another guy (Tatsuya) grab his d*ck?! WTF?! Talk about character assassination...
